Badges:
In this section you can create, edit and delete badges, also you can assign badges to members. These Badges are displayed on Member Profile page and on profile thumbnails(small photo).

Badges plugin supports Pages plugin and allows you to create badges which can be requested by page owners.
Also it supports Credits plugin and allows you to create special badges are given to members when they reach some count of credits, like 100 credits to get Bronze Member badge, 200 credits to get Silver Member badge, etc.

Here you can edit this badge details: Title, Short Description(which is shown on mouseover), detailed HTML-description and icons. If do not want to activate this badge for now, then just unselect `Enabled` field below. Also please choose requirements which should be fulfilled by members to get the badge.
This icon is displayed as a main large photo of this badge.
This icon is displayed as a small thumbnail of this badge.
Are you sure you want to delete this badge?
If you delete this badge then you won't be able to restore it back.

Please type Title, Short Description(which is shown on mouseover), detailed HTML-description and this badge icons. If do not want to activate this badge for now, then just unselect `Enabled` field below. Also please choose requirements which should be fulfilled by members to get the badge.

In this section you can view list of requests to get badges which are sent by page owners.

Create and edit page badges. These badges are displayed at Badges section in Edit Page, so page owners can view them and send badge request to you(Site Administration). Badges allow page owners to attract more visitors and fans to their pages, badges are displayed on Browse Pages section and can be put on Page Profile.
Below you can browse pages and edit their badges - assign new badges or remove badges.

Create and edit credit badges. These badges are provided to members based on number of earned credits, something like Ranks: 100 credits to get Bronze Member badge, 200 credits to get Silver Member badge, etc. These Badges are displayed on Member Profile page and on profile thumbnails(small photo).
The number of credits is required to get this badge:

If you delete this rank, then you won't be able to restore it.
No, the badge is activated as soon as he receives it

Display badge-icon on members thumbnails if they have a badge?
Yes, display badge-icon on members thumbnails
